LanguageData.FT_SettingTooltip_AgeOfCaring: Until what child's age their parent will care about their troubles in years.
LanguageData.FT_SettingTooltip_CannibalsCareAboutChil: If checked, pawns with Cannibal trait will care about their family.
LanguageData.FT_SettingTooltip_BloodlustCareAboutChil: If checked, pawns with Bloodlust trait will care about their family.
LanguageData.FT_SettingLabel_FamilyDiedThought: Psychopaths don't care about family death (requires restart)
LanguageData.FT_SettingTooltip_FamilyDiedThought: If checked, pawns with Psychopath trait will ignore family members' deaths.
LanguageData.FT_SettingLabel_FamilyDiedSocial: Psychopaths don't care at all (requires restart)
LanguageData.FT_SettingTooltip_FamilyDiedSocial: If checked, pawns with Psychopath trait will be indifferent to killer and to the ones who sold psycho's relatives.
LanguageData.FT_SettingTooltip_ChildrenWorry: If checked, children will care about their parents' pain and sickness.
LanguageData.FT_SettingTooltip_ChildMinEmpathyAge: Children younger than this will not care about their parents' troubles.
LanguageData.FT_SettingTooltip_ChildMaxEmpathyAge: Children older that this will not care about their parents' troubles.
LanguageData.FT_SettingTooltip_ChildrenWorry_PainThre: From which parents' pain level children will worry for them.
LanguageData.FT_SettingLabel_ChildrenWorry_SickThresh: Base threshold for parents' sickness severity
LanguageData.FT_SettingTooltip_ChildrenWorry_SickThre: From which parents' sickness severity level children will worry for them.
LanguageData.FT_SettingTooltip_ProudForMasterpiece: If checked, parents will get a mood buff when their child creates a Masterwork or Legendary item.
LanguageData.FT_SettingTooltip_ProudForSkillUp: If checked, parents will get a mood buff when their child levels up a skill.
